patch:
diff --git a/src/xxd/xxd.c b/src/xxd/xxd.c
index cf8b4ea6a..14272a373 100644
--- a/src/xxd/xxd.c
+++ b/src/xxd/xxd.c
@@ -223,9 +223,9 @@ char osver[] = "";
  * - zero (end line)               -> 1 byte
  */
 #define LLEN (2*(int)sizeof(unsigned long) + 2 +     /* addr + ": " */ \
-             (11 * 2 + 4 + 1) * (COLS / 2) +         /* 1st group */   \
+             (12 * 2 + 4 + 1) * (COLS / 2) +         /* 1st group */   \
 	     1 +                                     /* space */       \
-	     (1 + 11) * COLS +                       /* 2nd group */   \
+	     (1 + 12) * COLS +                       /* 2nd group */   \
 	     1 +                                     /* new line */    \
 	     1)                                      /* zero */
